ud2.8:3.2: kuṇḍikāyaṃ → kuṇḍiyāyaṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1), kuṇḍadhānavane → kuṇḍiṭṭhānavane (s1-3, pts1)
ud2.8:7.4: saha vacanā ca pana → saha vacanā pana (pts1) | saha vacanā (?)
ud2.8:11.9: pacchā tvaṃ karissasī’ti → pacchā so karissati (s1-3, pts1) | karissasīti saññāpehi (mr)
ud2.8:13.3: Dvinnaṃ kho te ahaṃ → dvinnaṃ kho tesaṃ (pts1) | dvinnaṃ kho nesaṃ (mr)
